nodes.text: Birds or avians were a group of organisms which included the convorees from the moon of Wasskah and the porgs of the ocean planet Ahch-To. Birds also lived on the arboreal planet Naboo, as well as the moon of Yavin 4 and the forest planet Rodia, where they were included in the diet of predatory Ghests. Many birds had feathers, wings, and the ability to fly. They were hatched from eggs. Sentient avian species included the Hiitians, the Snees, and the Whiforlans.
Avians on a number of worlds would imprint on the first creature they saw once their emerged from their eggs.
